statements: UPDATE ar_art_exhibition SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE id = 5;

UPDATE ar_art_exhibition SET likes = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ar_art_exhibition SET art_title = 'Updated Art Title', art_description = 'New description for the art piece' WHERE user_id = 5;
